articles.description: Oliver Stone , 74, told Russian media outlets he had 'heard good things about the Russian vaccine' before taking it himself. Russia started the mass rollout of the Sputnik V vaccine last week.
articles.content:
Oliver Stone has taken the Russian coronavirus vaccine and accused the West of 'ignoring' the injection.
The radical left-wing director, 74, told Russian media outlets he had 'heard good things abou… [+3812 chars]

articles.title: U.S. healthcare workers suffer allergic reactions to Pfizer/BioNTech COVID-19 shot - NYT - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Two healthcare workers in Alaska has had a severe allergic reaction to Pfizer (NYSE:PFE) and BioNTech’s (NASDAQ:BNTX) COVID-19 vaccine, the New York Times reported, but experts say that the vaccine is still safe for the general public.The first worker, a midd…
